name: EDD Pro
excerpt: Running an Easy Digital Downloads store? Use this extension to create upsell popups, cross-sell popups, and more!

name: Geotargeting
excerpt: Target countries, regions, and postal codes with new geotargeting conditions.

name: WooCommerce Pro
excerpt: Take your WooCommerce store's performance to the next level by creating upsell and cross-sell popups and more with our advanced conditions and triggers.

name: Exit Intent Popups
excerpt: Easily turn abandoning users into cash! Exit Intent opens a popup when users attempt to leave your site.

name: Popup Analytics
excerpt: Create high performance popups with Analytics - get up-to-the-minute statistical information on impressions, conversions, and more.

name: Advanced Theme Builder
excerpt: Build more powerful and influential themes for your popups - this extension allows you to add background images to different elements of your popup.

name: Age Verification Modals
excerpt: Streamline and enhance your user experience, and protect your content from unqualified users using the Age Verification Modals Extension.

name: Scroll Triggered Popups
excerpt: Use this extension and market your valuable content as users scroll down your pages - great for increasing revenue and funneling users throughout your site.

name: AJAX Login Modals
excerpt: Use this Extension in a variety of ways and streamline and enhance your user experience. Great for protecting content or preventing access without logging in on your site.

name: Forced Interaction
excerpt: Disabling the close button can be used in a variety of ways, from protecting content or areas of your site to forcing users to complete an action before continuing.

name: Secure Idle User Logout
excerpt: Use this extension to securely log users out once they have entered an idle state. Display a warning and automatically logout if they don't respond.

name: Advanced Targeting Conditions
excerpt: Target specific sets of your users with new conditions such as Mobile Detection, User Roles & Login Checks, Users from Google, custom conditions & more.

name: Terms & Conditions Popups
excerpt: Require users to agree to your terms & conditions before viewing pages, clicking buttons & more. Great for forcing agreement prior to clicking add to cart.

name: Remote Content
excerpt: Managing dozens of popups? Replace them all with a dynamic solution. Convert a list of links into popups in no time. Creating single page apps is a breeze.

name: MailChimp Integration
excerpt: With this extension, you can now easily and quickly add a sign up form to your popups to add users to your mailing list in MailChimp.

name: Aweber Integration
excerpt: With this extension, you can now easily and quickly add a sign up form to your popups to add users to your mailing list in Aweber.

name: Scheduling
excerpt: Add scheduling options to your popups. With multiple schedule types, you can precisely schedule your popups in just a few minutes.

name: Videos
excerpt: Create the ultimate WordPress Video Popup for your marketing videos in minutes - customize your player, control video play/pause commands, and much more.
